title: Sports Rules Quiz
description: Do you remember the rules of popular sports? Put your knowledge to the test

questions.question: In basketball, how many players from each team are on the court at the same time?
In tennis, what is the score called when both players have 40 points?
How many players are on a standard soccer (football) team on the field?
In baseball, how many strikes result in a batter being 'out'?
In American football, how many points is a touchdown worth?
In volleyball, how many times can a team hit the ball before it must cross the net?
The 'offside' rule is a key regulation in which sport?
In golf, what is the term for completing a hole one stroke under par?
In ice hockey, when a player commits a minor penalty, they sit in the penalty box for how long?
In cricket, how many wickets must fall to end an innings (in a standard match)?
A 'double fault' in tennis occurs when a player does what?
options: Hits the ball out twice in a row

questions.question: In boxing, how many rounds is a standard professional championship bout?
In rugby union, how many points is a 'try' worth?
In swimming, which stroke must be performed face-down with simultaneous arm movements and a dolphin kick?
In table tennis, how many points are needed to win a standard game?
